name: The Swing Coat in aqua bloom
description:
This charming little Swing Coat is fully reversible, with wide bell sleeves and optional "cuffs", and snap closure.  For the modern little mama.  

100% cotton, machine wash/dry

ready to ship

name: Far, Far Away fabric~ unicorns on green
description:
From Heather Ross' Far Far Away fabric line, this listing is for one half yard of the hard to find Unicorn fabric. Features white unicorns on a green background.

100% cotton double gauze.  Approx 43"-44" wide.  

Cut straight from the bolt.  If you would like more than one half yard, please adjust the quantity at checkout.  Sold in half yard increments (so if you would like one yard, please put "2" in the quantity box).

name: The Halter Dress sewing pattern
description:
This stunning dress will be your little one's special occasion go-to of the season. This dress will take you from a birthday to a wedding, and from the beach to the theatre.

The halter style is classic and exquisite, featuring ties at neck, completely lined bodice, full twirly skirt, and elastic back waistband. 
This pattern is ideal for the advanced beginner through advanced level seamstresses. A good grasp of basic sewing terms suggested.  Multi-sized pattern for sizes 1T-10. Comes with tons of ideas on how to make your Halter Dress uniquely yours!

This pattern is available in a PDF file format. The PDF pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours of cleared payment. Pattern includes my personal full scale handmade pattern pieces, along with complete instructions, helpful hints, and a list of materials. 

Happy Sewing! 

~~ We're sharing the love! Independent crafters MAY sell items created from this pattern, we just ask that you please credit the design to Whole Grain Baby. Sounds fair, right? Items created from this pattern may not be commercially or mass produced.~~

name: The Raglan Shift Dress sewing pattern
description:
Now you can make your own Whole Grain Baby designs at home!

The Raglan Shift Dress sewing pattern is one of the most versatile patterns out there! So many options! 

This pattern features serged or traditional hems (a serger is not necessarily required to make this dress), and three-quarter bell sleeves or short cap sleeves. Elastic neckline ensures the perfect fit for your little one. This pattern is ideal for brand new seamstresses and more advanced seamstresses alike. Multi-sized pattern for sizes 1T-6. Comes with tons of ideas on how to make your Raglan Dress uniquely yours!

This pattern is available in a PDF file format. The PDF pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours of cleared payment. Pattern includes my personal full scale handmade pattern pieces, along with complete instructions, helpful hints, and a list of materials. 

Happy Sewing!

description:

This sewing pattern features a full ruffle collar, which pulls on for easy wear, and an elbow length sleeve or sleeveless version.   This pattern is ideal for brand new seamstresses and more advanced seamstresses alike. Multi-sized pattern for sizes S, M, L, and XL.

name: The Square Neck Dress sewing pattern
description:
Now you can make your own Whole Grain Baby designs at home!

The Square Neck Dress sewing pattern is perfect for your little uptown girl.  Sophisticated square neckline, fully lined bodice, optional gathered or fitted skirt, bell sleeves with contrasting band, and button and loop closure.  Multi-sized pattern for sizes 1T-8. 

This pattern is available in a PDF file format. The PDF pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours of cleared payment. Pattern includes my personal full scale handmade pattern pieces, along with complete instructions, helpful hints, and a list of materials.

name: The Swing Coat sewing pattern
description:
Now you can create your own WGB designs at home!

The Swing Coat infant/toddler pattern features three grow-with-me sizes: 1/2T, 3/4T, and 5/6. The youth pattern also features three sizes: 7/8, 10, and 12.  Please specify if you would like infant/toddler or youth sizes at checkout.  (If you would like the whole size range at a discounted rate, please see the seperate listing for the Swing Coat Bundle Pack, also in the shop).

It is fully reversible, with wide bell sleeves and optional "cuffs", and your choice of a snap tab or button tab closure. This coat would be a great summer jacket using two lightweight quilting cottons, or a warmer fall/winter coat using a heavier home dec. weight cotton and a coordinating cotton print. The Swing Coat would also make an amazing back-to-school accessory!

This pattern is available in a PDF file format. The PDF pattern will be emailed to you within 24-48 hours of cleared payment. Pattern includes my personal full scale handmade pattern pieces, along with complete instructions, helpful hints, a list of materials, and full color photos to help any level of crafter create a Swing Coat with ease!

Happy Sewing!

~~ We're sharing the love! Independent crafters MAY sell items created from this pattern, (yup, here on Etsy, too!) we just ask that you please credit the design to Whole Grain Baby along with the following link: www.wholegrainbaby.etsy.com. Sounds fair, right? Items created from this pattern may not be commercially or mass produced.~~

name: The Ruffler Dress and Blouse sewing pattern~ for girls
description:
Now you can make your own Whole Grain Baby designs at home!

The Ruffler Blouse and Dress pattern features 2 different options: a sleeveless dress with a full ruffle collar, and a raglan-sleeved blouse with ruffle collar. The collar can be worn up or down depending on the mood of the day. Slips on over head, no buttons or zippers, this pattern would be appropriate for an advanced beginner or even a beginner-beginner who has a lot of determination! Includes sizes 1T-6.

This pattern is available in a PDF file format. The PDF pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours of cleared payment. Pattern includes my personal full scale handmade pattern pieces, along with complete instructions, tons of photos, and a list of materials.

name: The Little Mod Dress sewing pattern
description:
Now you can make your own Whole Grain Baby designs at home!

The Little Mod Dress features a rounded front and back yoke and comes with a few different closure options. Unlike many other round-yoke style dresses, this dress is designed with a flat bodice at the front and back neckline, giving it a more "mod"-ern and updated feel, and a little more structure. Multi-sized pattern for sizes 1T-6.

This pattern is available in a PDF file format. The PDF pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours of cleared payment. Pattern includes my personal full scale handmade pattern pieces, along with complete instructions, helpful hints, and a list of materials.

name: The Raglan Shift Dress in Plum Picnic
description:
The sweetest little dress for your little sweetheart...

Easy fitting elasticized neckline ensures a perfect fit.  Trendy "raw" (serged) hemline keeps baby fashion forward.  The perfect dress for summer days, and looks fabulous layered over a long sleeve tee and leggings for chilly nights.

Ready to ship.  Size 6-12 months.  

Please contact us if you are interested in coordinating bloomers.

name: The Raglan Shift Dress in garden gnomes
description:
Rollin' with the Gnomies!

Easy fitting elasticized neckline ensures a perfect fit.  Trendy little garden gnomes are sure to keep baby fashion forward.  The perfect dress for summer days, and looks fabulous layered over a long sleeve tee and leggings for chilly nights.

Ready to ship.  Size 12-24 months.  

100% cotton, machine wash/dry.

Please contact us if you are interested in coordinating bloomers.

name: Raglan Shift Dress in sunny days
description:
The sweetest little dress...

Easy fitting elasticized neckline ensures a perfect fit.  The go-to dress for summer days, and looks fabulous layered over a long sleeve tee and leggings for chilly nights. Features a wonderfully modern leaf motif, made of a 100% organic cotton/bamboo blend~ this fabric is super soft and airy, a dream to wear.

Ready to ship. Size 2T.

100% cotton/bamboo, machine wash/dry.

Please contact us if you are interested in coordinating bloomers.

name: The Raglan Shift Dress in mint julep
description:

Easy fitting elasticized neckline ensures a perfect fit.  The go-to dress for summer days, and looks fabulous layered over a long sleeve tee and leggings for chilly nights. Features a wonderfully modern botanical print with contrasting sleeves. 100% cotton.

Ready to ship. 
machine wash/dry

name: The Picnic Dress sewing pattern
description:
The Picnic Dress sewing pattern is a charming little number for all your favorite warm weather activities!  Inspired by a dress I wore as a little girl, this dress screams "simple chic"... featuring a tear-shaped cutaway back, tie closure, A-line shape, and optional contrasting band down the front.  And did I mention that it's reversible?  For even more options!

This pattern is ideal for the beginner through advanced level seamstresses. A good grasp of basic sewing terms suggested. Multi-sized pattern for sizes 1T-4T.  Comes with tons of ideas on how to make the Picnic Dress uniquely yours!

This pattern is available in a PDF file format. The PDF pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours of cleared payment. Pattern includes my personal full scale handmade pattern pieces, along with complete instructions, step-by-step photos, helpful hints, and a list of materials.

Happy Sewing!
